original_text: It was the month of Nisan, when King Artaxerxes had ruled Babylon for 20 years. I had the king's wine ready for him to drink. I took it to give to him. He saw that I was sad. I had not been sad in front of the king before.
korean_text: 아닥사스다 왕 제이십년 니산월에 왕 앞에 포도주가 있기로 내가 그 포도주를 왕에게 드렸는데 이전에는 내가 왕 앞에서 수심이 없었더니

sentences.original_text: It was the month of Nisan
when King Artaxerxes had ruled Babylon for 20 years
sentences.korean_translation: 아르사깃사스 왕이 바빌론을 다스린 지 20년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: I had the king's wine ready for him to drink
I took it to give to him
He saw that I was sad
I had not been sad in front of the king before
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이전에 왕 앞에서 슬퍼한 적이 없었다
